alert.note: Alert for Benton; Henry (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 03 at 3:57AM CST until January 03 at 4:30AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 AM CST FOR NORTHERN BENTON AND CENTRAL HENRY COUNTIES... At 357 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles south of Paris Landing State Park, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Paris, Paris Landing State Park, Springville, Big Sandy, Mansfield, Haigler Ridge, Manleyville, Old Springville, India, Sunnyside, Van Dyke, Spring Creek and Big Sandy Unit Tennessee National Wildlife Refuge. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CST for west Tennessee. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
